jobDescription: Research Data Analyst I  19-Jun-2018 Job Code and Payroll Title 6255 Research Data Analyst I Job SummaryJOB OVERVIEW Under direct supervision, the Research Data Analyst acquires skills and knowledge of professional concepts in research data analysis. Works on small projects or segments of projects with limited scope and complexity.  The Research Data Analyst will play a pivotal role in supporting this research and educational agenda through analysis, data and support. They will carry out hands on analysis of omics data in the context of our Alzheimer’s disease (AD) drug discovery work. INSTITUTE FOR COMPUTATIONAL HEALTH SCIENCES The mission of our group is to understand, measure, and improve the health of patients with chronic skin disease as well as train future leaders in the field of patient-oriented research ABOUT UCSF The University of California, San Francisco (UCSF) is a leading university dedicated to promoting health worldwide through advanced biomedical research, graduate-level education in the life sciences and health professions, and excellence in patient care. It is the only campus in the 10-campus UC system dedicated exclusively to the health sciences. Organization Campus Req Number49844BRLocation Mission Hall - Mission Bay Job Title Research Data Analyst Appointment Type Career Percentage100%Shift Length 8 Hours Shift Days Work Days Monday – Friday, 40 hours per week Required QualificationsBachelor's degree in related area or equivalent experience / trainingKnowledge of bioinformatics methods and tools (differential expression, etc.)Background in NeuroscienceAbility to program (R, Python)Basic consultation and communication skillsAbility to effectively manage time and see assigned parts of projects through to completion on deadlinePreferred QualificationsAcquiring knowledge of research function. Acquiring ability to perform research analysis dutiesAcquiring statistical analysis, systems programming, and database design skills to perform research analysis dutiesLicense/Certification n/a Position Type Full Time Department Name Institute for Computational Health Sciences Equal Employment Opportunity The University of California San Francisco is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer.
